judgements: ['Summary : Discusses the difficulty of self-supporting and how voluntary poverty and manual labor are the means of the C.W .', 'They may look on the most vicious person , and if he is at that moment good and kind and doing something which they can be interested in or admire , there they are , pouring out their hearts to him .', 'Great crimes , it is true , have been committed in the name of human brotherhood ; that may serve to obscure the truth , but we must keep on saying it .']
